summary: Three stories of abused and forsaken girls who return from the dead to take their revenge.
cast: Jessica Oberhausen|Joseph Luis Caballero|Rebecca Mullins|Aubrey Joyce Tunnell|Nick Cardiff|Matty Robinson|Craig Sunderlin|Mia Doran|Madalyn Mattsey|Ali Hadley|Samantha Steveson|Andrew Jacob DeHart|Jax Turyna|Jennifer Lenius|Brian Rooney|Kelsey Sante|Joette Waters|Marc Peurye|Ivan Vega|Jennifer Arenella|Mariah Ballantine|Shivaun Barlow|Carol Barsotti|David Baum|Laura Bednarski|Terry Bell|Tyler Biondo|Kara Brinkman|Alexandra Cantarella|Madeline Cole|Rachel Cyr|Amanda Deleone|Harold Dennis|Joyce Dillon|Crystal Divis|Erin Donlon|Colleen Elizabeth|Aimee Falls-Tabert|Kiri Ann Ficher|Josh Gaetz|Michele Grosspietch|Hannah Grosspietsch|Shawna Hippert|Eliana Horbatenko|Shelby Jensen|Kimberly Jones|Onuté Jureviciute|Jon Kasunic|Megan Ligeti|Lynn Lowry|Mahogany Milan|Phil Platakis|Tyler Russell|Noémi Santo|Dagoberto Zolio Soto|Alexis Stoneking|Bill Stoneking|Chris Swensen|Ashley Volk|David Fischer

title: Dead Girls
